DOC.brief_summary: This study define pharmacokinetics evaluate safety BAY73-4506 , 160 mg daily administer orally single agent Japanese patient advance solid tumor .
DOC.brief_title: Phase I Study Investigate Pharmacokinetics Safety BAY73-4506 Asian ( Japanese ) Patients With Solid Tumors .
DOC.criteria: Male female Japanese patient > /= 18 year Histologically cytologically confirm solid tumor ECOGPS 0 1 Adequate bone marrow , liver renal function Uncontrolled hypertension Patients severe renal impairment dialysis Patients seizure disorder require anticonvulsant medication Known suspect allergy investigational agent .
